name: ovos-sprint
description: Workload management and resource planning tool

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:frontend && npm run test:coverage:backend
